rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0001
rows.name:
This place always gives me
a sense of peace.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0002
rows.name:
I know what you mean.
It's so empty...in a good way.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0003
rows.name:
The salvaging business is doing well,
but it's nothing like the bustling
activity in Avaritia...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0004
rows.name:
Their primary industries aren't
as developed as those in Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0005
rows.name:
If you're looking for a peaceful place
to retire, you couldn't find better
than this.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0006
rows.name: You sound like an old geezer, Prince!

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0007
rows.name: Hey, what do you think, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0008
rows.name: I'd like to try living here.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0009
rows.name: Huh? I didn't expect that response.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0010
rows.name:
Staying in this house has been
exciting. It's given me a glimpse
into how ordinary people live.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0011
rows.name: I agree.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0012
rows.name:
It's so different from city inns,
everything feels new and interesting.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0013
rows.name:
That's because you two are used
to the finer things in life...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0014
rows.name: Like you're any different, Zeke?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0015
rows.name:
Since we left Luxuria,
we've spent plenty of nights
under the stars, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0016
rows.name: Sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0017
rows.name:
It was especially tough in Invidia
and Superbia when we were waiting
for Rex and the others to show up.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0018
rows.name:
We were constantly on edge,
thinking you'd arrive any minute,
but you took your sweet time.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0019
rows.name:
Those camping days were rough...
when our food supplies ran low,
we almost had to eat Kamekichi...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0020
rows.name:
Let's not talk about that.
Even remembering it is painful.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0021
rows.name:
At least waiting at this port
was more comfortable.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0022
rows.name:
At least we had
the ship's cabin to sleep in.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0023
rows.name:
...You've really been through a lot,
haven't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0024
rows.name:
I'd prefer to avoid
stakeouts altogether,
if possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0025
rows.name: Anyway, enough about the past.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0026
rows.name:
Actually, there's something
I wanted to ask you, Meleph.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0027
rows.name: This place is pretty great, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0028
rows.name:
I'm worried Superbia and Invidia
might get into a conflict over it.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0029
rows.name: For now, there shouldn't be a problem.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0030
rows.name:
If either nation tried to claim
these islands, it would effectively
be a declaration of war.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0031
rows.name:
At the very least,
our nation has no desire for conflict.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0032
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0033
rows.name: That's somewhat reassuring to hear.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0034
rows.name:
I'm curious why you're so
concerned about this, Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0035
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0036
rows.name: Because this is Rex's hometown.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0037
rows.name: Because it's a unique place in Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0101
rows.name:
It's natural to worry about
a friend's hometown, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0102
rows.name: I suppose that's fair.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0103
rows.name:
We need to make sure the kid can focus
without any nagging concerns.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0104
rows.name:
We can't have him distracted
by worries about his village, can we?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0105
rows.name: That's very thoughtful of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0106
rows.name: That's because I'm an adult! Ha ha ha!

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0107
rows.name: Somehow the last part ruined it.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0201
rows.name: That's quite the grand statement.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0202
rows.name:
I believe a boy like Rex
could only develop properly
in a place like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0204
rows.name:
For example,
many boys raised in Alba Margen
want to join the imperial army, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0205
rows.name:
There's nothing wrong with that,
but it's unlikely to produce
a Driver of Heaven's Holy Grail...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0206
rows.name:
Someone capable of changing Alst
doesn't come along easily,
nor is raising such a person simple...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0207
rows.name:
Moreover, countries and systems
sometimes crush that potential.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0208
rows.name:
This village, however,
is separate from all that. It has
freedom and tremendous potential.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0209
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0210
rows.name:
Well Prince, you're making
a surprisingly compelling argument
for once...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0211
rows.name: Oh, be quiet!

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0212
rows.name:
However, I find myself
in agreement with Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0213
rows.name:
Places like this are essential
to Alst's future...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0214
rows.name:
It is our duty to protect them,
no matter what.
